overview:
Movex : You Pack, We Drive, You Save

Movex moving and storage has been in the business of moving families around the country since 1930 with great care and expertise. More than 70 million Americans will be â€œpacking it up and taking it on the roadâ€ as they move to new homes this year alone. When you make the choose Movex moving and storage , you can depend on quality service thatâ€™s unmatched in the moving industry. The Movex name is synonymous with quality and Movex Reviews are always positive as our customer service team go the extra mile to get great movex reviews and customer satisfaction ratings.

Moving with Movex combines the convenience of full service moving with the value you get with a rental truck. You load, we drive, you save. Why risk driving a rental across the country or pay an expensive full-service moving company? Take control of your move and gain peace of mind in the process. Movex will arrange for a fully-equipped, top of the line moving van to come to your home. It will be equipped with LOADING RAMPS (to save your back), TIE DOWN STRAPS (to secure your items and keep them from sliding around and getting damaged), FURNITURE BLANKETS (to protect your belongings), and a DOLLY (why carry everything when you can roll it?) . You Load. We drive to your new residence and you unload the truck. Our moving truck service is simple and inexpensive ! Join the thousands of families who have trusted Movex with their long distance move.

Call: 1-800-876-6839 to schedule your move today!
